snippet.title: Firefight Descent - Quarantine CE3 2014 Trailer
snippet.description:
From: Lavadeeto/Pepzee
Sequel to 2012's Firefight Descent, with a twist! Fight your way through wave after wave again with new enemies, equipment, and features. Play as Hoxton, part of Delta squad, a group of highly trained Orbital Drop Shock Troopers, or ODSTs. Experience firefight like you've never experienced it before! Coming soon to HaloMaps.org.

See more CE3 at http://haloce3.com
